game.7310: Read the rules of the game

index.5920: Read the rules of the game

room.9245: We are waiting for other players

rules.958: During card selection, Command cards you have taken may be immediately disposed of (discarded) instead of being programmed into the Command Line.
rules.2651: Players can drag and push items and other players
rules.3350: The actions of bots are no different from those of regular players
rules.4103: Removes a card and allows you to swap 2 undamaged slots or move the stack to an empty slot
rules.4250: Removes a card and allows you to remove damage for one slot
rules.4345: After all cards have been dealt, each player must place cards into slots on the terminal or dispose of them, a set of cards in a slot is called
rules.4867: Each turn, monsters appear on vacant spawn cells and move one cell toward the item
rules.5146: Monsters can attack 4 adjacent squares, in this case the item gets 2 damage and the player gets 0
rules.5449: The damage received is determined by the Damage Cards that are drawn from the Damage Deck (chosen at random). Damage can make it hard to control the Warrior and make it harder to reach your goal! But - don't worry. You can't die!
rules.5478: In each player's turn phase, only the card at the top of the stack will be played in each slot. The other cards in the stack are ignored.
rules.5524: When playing with bots is not required to be connected to the network, you can play even if the server is not available at the moment.
rules.5991: After the Command Cards are programmed into the Command String, their place and order become fixed. They can only be reprogrammed (reordered) by disposing of electric or computer cards during the card selection phase.
rules.6703: If a fourth Command Card of the same element is played on the stack, the lowest Command Card is discarded.The stack still contains 3 cards and the Power is 3, but the top card becomes the new active card.
rules.7118: At the beginning of the game, a deck of random cards is created, players take turns choosing cards and saving on the right panel
rules.7192: Bots can complicate the game, as they act at their own discretion and their plan of action may differ from yours.
rules.7338: Your goal is to get the item to the exit square.
rules.7471: Removes a card with no effects
rules.7846: A Command Card of a different element (different color) can be played on an existing stack, but then the entire old stack must be discarded so that only one new Command Card remains in its place.
rules.8365: Read them if you are interested in all the fine points, they are relevant except for some notations
rules.8391: The stack can contain up to 3 Command Cards, as long as they are all the same color/element. Increasing the size of the stack increases the effect of the Command Card. Each Command Card is marked with its effects for different Power levels (stack of 1, 2, 3 cards). When a card is stacked, you cannot choose a lower power level.
rules.8547: If there is more than one Command card in the Command slot, it is a stack.
rules.8599: You may only dispose of cards from the cards you took when you selected them. Cards already placed in slots cannot be disposed of.
rules.8807: You can see all the cards on this page
rules.10001: If a player quits during the game or the connection with him is broken for other reasons, instead of him the bot starts to play
rules.10002: You can not join a game that has already begun, in future updates this may change
